channel.title: 华尔街日报

item.title: 皮尤调查显示，大多数美国公立学校教师认为，应该让学生了解奴隶制遗留下来的问题对当今美国黑人的影响，而且家长不应该让孩子选择不上有关种族主义的课程。
item.description:
Most U.S. public-school teachers think students should be taught that the legacy of slavery affects Black Americans today and that parents shouldn’t be able to opt their children out of lessons on racism, according to Pew https://t.co/QkSDml5oYE https://t.co/QkSDml5oYE

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 25, 2024
